Room.Name: Secret Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a well hidden, secret hallway, north of the main hallway.
Room.LongDescription: There are two doors on both ends of the hallway. The door on the south appears to lead back into the main hallway under the glacier. The door on the north is bolted and locked with a shimmering, silvery lock. An odd but powerful gold glow is radiated out from the room behind the north door that you can see through the keyhole. The light is so bright that you can't see anything else in the room.
